Derivatives

ddxarcsin⁡(x)=11−x2\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}x}\arcsin(x) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1 - x^2}}dxd​arcsin(x)=1−x2​1​
ddxarccos⁡(x)=−11−x2\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}x}\arccos(x) = \frac{-1}{\sqrt{1 - x^2}}dxd​arccos(x)=1−x2​−1​
ddxarctan⁡(x)=11+x2\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d}x}\arctan(x) = \frac{1}{1 + x^2}dxd​arctan(x)=1+x21​
